argparse_input module¶

argparse_input.main_args()¶
Returns:JSON_filename: name of JSON file to be read
Returns:RF_data_filename: name of binary file to be read
Returns:image_filename: name of file to save image as
Returns:display: Boolean input where True displays B-mode image and False does not display
Returns:save: Boolean input where True saves B-mode image under image_filename
argparse_input.parse_cli()¶

Argument Parser

Returns:all arguments included in argument parser
